Room.Name: Light Rain Over Kista Forest
Room.ShortDescription: Light rain falls in a steady drizzle over this part of the forest.
Room.LongDescription: the rain splatters and collects to run down the copper platelets on the great dragon beneath you. She seems to have picked up a little speed, perhaps to get out of this weather. Maybe you should let her pick the way, until you can see where you are.
